programme.desc: Mark is still upset not to be invited to the wedding. Donna prepares to go to a night time modeling gig.

programme.desc: Caroline discusses her honeymoon with Brooke and Brooke tells her of her own broken engagement.

programme.desc: Ridge tells Stephanie that he thinks she set Eric up. She slaps him and explains that they were in love.
